name: Yummy Rolls
steps: Boil 1 c. of water. Pour into mixing bowl over 1 c. of shortening. Whip until dissolved.
Add ¾ c. sugar, 2 tsp. salt, 1 c. cold water, 4 eggs. Beat well.
Add yeast mixture when yeast is foaming and to top of cereal bowl. Mix together well. Add 7 c. of flour, mix and
knead well. Grease a large bowl, pour dough in and cover. Refrigerate for 2 hours. Dump onto floured surface.
Divide into four balls, roll each ball into a circle, brush with melted butter. Cut into slices (Like a pie) Roll them up
and let rise, covered for 3 hours. Bake at 375 for 10 min. Brush with butter while hot.
